metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
resource group name where Microsoft Sentinel is setup
subscription id where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

connectorUiConfig.title: Cyera DSPM Azure Sentinel Data Connector
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Cyera DSPM](https://api.cyera.io/) data connector allows you to connect to your Cyera's DSPM instance and ingesting Classifications, Assets, Issues, and Identity Definitions into Microsoft Sentinel. The data connector is built on Microsoft Sentinel's Codeless Connector Platform and uses the Cyera's API to fetch Cyera's [DSPM Telemetry](https://www.cyera.com/) once recieced can be correlated with security events creating custom columns so that queries don't need to parse it again, thus resulting in better performance.

sampleQueries.description: Get Sample of Cyera DSPM Classification Definitions
Get Sample of Cyera DSPM Datastore Assets
Get Sample of Cyera DSPM Issues Identified
Get Sample of Cyera DSPM Identities

dataTypes.name: CyeraDSPMClassifications_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyeraDSPMClassifications_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(48h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyeraDSPMAssets_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyeraDSPMAssets_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(48h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyeraDSPMIssues_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyeraDSPMIssues_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(48h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: CyeraDSPMIdentities_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
CyeraDSPMIdentities_CL
       | where TimeGenerated > ago(48h)                | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

instructionSteps.title: Cyera DSPM Authentication
instructionSteps.description: Connect to your Cyera DSPM tenenant via Personal Access Tokens

parameters.label: Cyera Personal Access Token Client ID
parameters.name: username

parameters.label: Cyera Personal Access Token Secret Key
parameters.name: password

dataFlows.transformKql:
source
| extend TimeGenerated = now() 
| project-rename infrastructureType = type

properties.descriptionHtml:
Note: Please refer to the following before installing the solution:

Review the solution Release Notes

There may be known issues pertaining to this Solution, please refer to them before installing.

The Cyera DSPM data connector allows you to connect to your Cyera's DSPM instance and ingesting Classifications, Assets, Issues, and Identity Definitions into Microsoft Sentinel. The data connector is built on Microsoft Sentinel's Codeless Connector Platform and uses the Cyera's API to fetch Cyera's DSPM Telemetry once recieced can be correlated with security events creating custom columns so that queries don't need to parse it again, thus resulting in better performance.

Learn more about Microsoft Sentinel | Learn more about Solutions
